column4: ok at the risk of the "Anybody" thing beeing throwen at me but is there there any info about getting Ubuntu server as a shipped CD available?
hmmm i know there is the mirrors but i got slow connection and well it have a 5 hr cut of timer
I dont think you'd get a server CD shipped out -- but couldnt you go to friends place and download the image -- or spend 10 minutes at an internet cafe?
